    public class Server.Connection
extends Object
implements NioHandler, IOSubchannel

    The internal representation of a connected client.

      • getResponsePipeline

        public EventPipeline getResponsePipeline()
        Description copied from interface: IOSubchannel

        Gets the EventPipeline that can be used for events going back to the initiator of this connection. Consistently using this event pipeline for response events ensures that the events are written in proper sequence.

        Specified by:
        getResponsePipeline in interface IOSubchannel
        Returns:
        the event pipeline
